# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR ${MINECPP_WORLD_DIR}/include/minecpp/world)
target_sources(minecpp_world PUBLIC
        # Source files
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/BlockState.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Chunk.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Generator.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/LightSystem.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Section.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SectionSlice.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Util.cpp

        # Header files
        ${MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR}/BlockState.h
        ${MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR}/Chunk.h
        ${MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR}/Generator.h
        ${MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR}/IChunkSystem.h
        ${MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR}/LightSystem.h
        ${MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR}/Section.h
        ${MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR}/SectionSlice.h
        ${MINECPP_WORLD_INCLUDE_DIR}/Util.h
)

# Subdirectories
add_subdirectory("population")
add_subdirectory("terrain")
